descriptions:
Introducing our delightful Squirrel House/Nesting Box, a perfect outdoor abode for your furry friends! This handcrafted nesting box is made from high-quality cedar wood, ensuring durability and resistance to weather elements.

The construction of our Squirrel House is a blend of artistry and craftsmanship, with both gluing and nailing techniques used for a sturdy build. The box features a beautifully burned image of a squirrel, expertly crafted by artist Drew Senesac, adding a touch of charm to your garden or yard.

The removable roof design allows for easy cleaning and maintenance, ensuring your squirrel guests have a hygienic and comfortable home. The box comes with all necessary mounting hardware included, making installation a breeze. The package includes 2 screws and 2 washers, with 2 pre-drilled holes for accurate placement.

Our Squirrel House/Nesting Box measures 12 inches in width, 11 inches in height, and 10 inches in depth on the outside, providing ample space for your squirrels. The inside dimensions are 5.75 inches in width and 9 inches in depth, with a 3.5-inch squirrel opening.

Invite nature into your backyard with our charming Squirrel House/Nesting Box. Order yours today!
